page.title: 18Education in Hayle.
page.content: There is a{Pre-School Playgroup}in Hayle where the very young children go.When they are nearly five they go to one of the two{County Primary Schools,Penpol or Bodriggy. The children stay at these schools until they are eleven when they start at {Hayle Comprehensive}School.After this some go on to the Penwith{Sixth Form {College}in Penzance or the Cornwall {College of Further Education}in Camborne.Evening Classes are arranged in the winter where people can learn a wide range of skills and take part in many activities.There are also many private clubs and societies in the town where people can follow their interests and hobbies.These include an Art Club,a Model Boat Club and the Old Cornwall Society.
